    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static Rule get(String hlid)
                throws KbTypeException,
                       CreateException
        Get the Rule that corresponds to hlid. Throws exceptions if the hlid doesn't correspond to an object in the KB, or if the object identified by hlid is not an assertion with an #$implies operator. NOTE: Most of the get (String) factory methods in other classes find objects based on hlids or string representations of the object. They use nameOrId as the string variable name. This method finds objects based on hlid alone. If you want to find a rule based on its string representation, try using get(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).
        Parameters:
        hlid - the hlid corresponding to the Rule in the KB
        Returns:
        a Rule based on hlid
        Throws:
        KbTypeException - if assertion based on hlid is not an instance of assertion with #$implies operator
        CreateException

      • get

        public static Rule get(String formulaStr,
       String ctxStr)
                throws KbTypeException,
                       CreateException,
                       KbObjectNotFoundException
        Get the Rule for formulaStr in the context ctxStr. Throws exceptions if no such assertion is found in the context, or if formulaStr is not a rule formula with #$implies.
        Parameters:
        formulaStr - string representation of the formula to be found
        ctxStr - string representation of the context of the formula
        Returns:
        a Rule based on formulaStr and ctxStr
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        KbObjectNotFoundException - if no Rule with the given formula is found in the context

      • get

        public static Rule get(Sentence formula,
       Context ctx)
                throws KbTypeException,
                       CreateException,
                       KbObjectNotFoundException
        Get the Rule that corresponds to formula in the context ctx. Throws exceptions if no such formula is found in the specified context in the KB, or if it's not an assertion with the #$imples operator.
        Parameters:
        formula - formula to be found
        ctx - context of the formula
        Returns:
        an Rule based on formula and context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        KbObjectNotFoundException - if no assertion with the given formula is found in the context

      • get

        public static Rule get(Sentence antecedent,
       Sentence consequent,
       Context ctx)
                throws KbTypeException,
                       CreateException,
                       KbObjectNotFoundException
        Get the Rule that corresponds to a formula with antecedent as its antecedent and consequent as its consequent in the context ctx. Throws exceptions if no such formula is found in the specified context, or if the formula is not a rule formula using #$implies.
        Parameters:
        antecedent - the literal in the ANTECEDENT of the rule
        consequent - the literal in the CONSEQUENT of the rule
        ctx - context of the formula
        Returns:
        a Rule based on antecedent and consequent is ctx
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        KbObjectNotFoundException - if no assertion with the given formula is found in the context

      • findOrCreate

        public static Rule findOrCreate(String formulaStr)
                         throws CreateException,
                                KbTypeException,
                                InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Rule that corresponds to formulaStr in the default assertion context. Tries to assert if no rule with that formula can be found in that context. Throws an exception if it is unable to create the rule in the KB. Strength is set to Strength.DEFAULT by default. Direction is set to Direction.BACKWARD by default.
        Parameters:
        formulaStr - the string representation of the rule to be found or created
        Returns:
        a Rule based on formulaStr in the default assertion context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no assertion with the given formula can be found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        public static Rule findOrCreate(String formulaStr,
                String ctxStr)
                         throws CreateException,
                                KbTypeException,
                                InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Rule that corresponds to formulaStr in the context ctxStr. Tries to assert if no rule with that formula can be found in that context. Throws an exception if it is unable to find or create the rule. Strength is set to Strength.DEFAULT by default. Direction is set to Direction.BACKWARD by default.
        Parameters:
        formulaStr - the string representation of the rule formula
        ctxStr - the string representation of the rule context
        Returns:
        a Rule based on formulaStr and ctxStr
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no assertion with the provided formula string can be found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        public static Rule findOrCreate(String formulaStr,
                String ctxStr,
                Assertion.Strength strength,
                Assertion.Direction direction)
                         throws CreateException,
                                KbTypeException,
                                InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Rule that corresponds to formulaStr in the context ctxStr with the specified strength and direction. Tries to assert if no rule with that formula can be found in that context. Throws an exception if it is unable to find or create such a rule.
        Parameters:
        formulaStr - the string representation of the formula to be found or created
        ctxStr - the string representation of the context of the formula
        strength - the strength of the assertion
        direction - the direction of the assertion
        Returns:
        a Rule based on formulaStr in ctxStr
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no assertion with the provided formula can be found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        public static Rule findOrCreate(Sentence formula)
                         throws KbTypeException,
                                CreateException
        Finds or creates the Rule object that corresponds to formula in the default assertion context DefaultContext. Tries to assert if no rule with that formula can be found in that context. Throws an exception if it is unable to find or create such an assertion. Strength is set to Strength.DEFAULT by default. Direction is set to Direction.BACKWARD by default.
        Parameters:
        formula - the formula to be found or created
        Returns:
        a Rule based on the formula in the default assertion context
        Throws:
        KbTypeException
        CreateException

      • findOrCreate

        public static Rule findOrCreate(Sentence formula,
                Context ctx)
                         throws KbTypeException,
                                CreateException,
                                InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Rule object that corresponds to formula in ctx. Tries to assert if no rule with that formula can be found in that context. Throws an exception if it is unable to make such an assertion. Strength is set to Strength.DEFAULT by default. Direction is set to Direction.BACKWARD by default
        Parameters:
        formula - the formula to be found or created
        ctx - the context of the formula
        Returns:
        a Rule based on formula and context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no assertion with the provided formula can be found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        public static Rule findOrCreate(Sentence formula,
                Context ctx,
                Assertion.Strength strength,
                Assertion.Direction direction)
                         throws CreateException,
                                KbTypeException,
                                InvalidFormulaInContextException
        Finds or creates the Rule object that corresponds to formula in ctx using the specified strength and direction. Tries to assert if no rule with that formula can be found in that context. Throws an exception if it is unable to find or create such an assertion. an assertion.
        Parameters:
        formula - the formula to be found or created
        ctx - the context of the formula
        strength - the strength of the assertion
        direction - the direction of the assertion
        Returns:
        a Rule based on formula and context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
        InvalidFormulaInContextException - if no assertion with the provided formula can be found or created in the context

      • findOrCreate

        public static Rule findOrCreate(Sentence antecedent,
                Sentence consequent,
                Context ctx)
                         throws KbTypeException,
                                CreateException
        Finds or creates the Rule that corresponds to a formula with antecedent and consequent in the context ctx. Throws exceptions if no such rule can be found or created in the specified context.
        Parameters:
        antecedent - the literal in the antecedent of the rule
        consequent - the literal in the antecedent of the rule
        ctx - context of the formula
        Returns:
        an Rule based on posLiteral and negLiteral in context
        Throws:
        CreateException
        KbTypeException
